quote: Gods are great,"" said Atsula, slowly, as if she were comprehending a great secret. ""But the heart is greater. For it is from our hearts they come, and to our hearts they shall return...
quote_letters: GODS ARE GREAT SAID ATSULA SLOWLY AS IF SHE WERE COMPREHENDING A GREAT SECRET BUT THE HEART IS GREATER FOR IT IS FROM OUR HEARTS THEY COME AND TO OUR HEARTS THEY SHALL RETURN
